commands.about:
Hi, I'm Ryan Buck Bamford.
I'm a fullstack developer.
I studied Web Application Development (DAW) at CIFP Zonzamas, Arrecife.
The technologies I use are:
-HTML        -CSS         -JavaScript
-PHP         -Python      -Laravel
-MySQL       -PostgreSQL  -Git
I'm currently learning:
-React (This portfolio is made with React)
commands.help:
The available commands are:
about
help
projects
contact
user -u <username>
ls
ls -a
cd <directory>|<directory/another_directory>|<.>|<..>
clear
fullstack

Operating  System      For        My         Development :)
